elements.name: Switch public lighting upon receiving a light measurement event

steps.name: a light measurement RTU using IEC60870 protocol
a light measurement device using IEC60870 protocol
a process image on the IEC60870 server
an ssld oslp device
the device returns a set transition response "OK" over "OSLP ELSTER"
an existing connection with the RTU
